content.text:
# Draft:The Association of Traditional Hot Air Balloon Artists in Southern Shan State

The Association of Traditional Hot Air Balloon Artists in Southern Shan State is a association which hosts and decides whether the Taunggyi Hot Air Balloon Festival will be hosted on. It also decides which team will win the first prize of the Taunggyi Tazaungdaing Hot Air Balloon Competition. Though the association's establishment date is not exactly sure, Locals say the first festival was began in 1946. The Taunggyi Tazaungdaing Festival has been hosted over 79 years though it is not exactly correct.
